name: Neha
greetingText: Happy Birthday Neha ✨❤️ Stay blessed, mst khub uchaiyan ko chuoo May you get everything you ever dreamt for and even more Aur zyda socha mt karo , mst har moment ko enjoy kr ache se , You're the most motivated girl I've ever seen in my life , Thankyou for always being there and supporting always Blessed to have you in my life ❤️❤️ Aur Voh kahi padha tha na !wake up , workout , look hot! 🤣 yeh tumpr bhi applicable hota h 😏 ,mst fit reh aur mujhe bhi daant kr krwaya kr😝 Also aise hi mere sath hamesha competition krte raha kr😂 Cheers to all these years of friendship and looking to creating a hell lot of more together
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many happy blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Enjoy your day, lots of love and warm wishes
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
